about_the_game:
FRIGHTENED is a cooperative horror and survival game that can be played with 1-4 players. Your goal is to destroy the evil with your team and leave. Collect items in the area with your team, find the demon's weak spot and destroy it! But don't you dare get caught.

You may want to play the game alone or you can play with your team of up to 4 people. You have to destroy the demon, so find the items that match the symbols in the pentagram and place them in the pentagram. He will be very angry about what you did, but there are two ways to calm him down, either by sacrificing someone or interacting with the objects around him, luckily you can calm him down or make him more angry. In order to save the victims, you need to find the medical bags around and help them. If you're lucky, you can destroy it without leaving anyone behind, but it won't be easy.

How can I stop the demon?

What do I need to do in order to beat it?
  • Find the Enchanted Paper.
  • Find the Ritual Water.
  • Find Creature's Skull.
After collecting the required items, go to the pentagram in the GYM and put the collected items in their spot, after 10 rituals the demon will perish but you need to be careful as it will get more angry after each ritual.

How can I stop the demon?

stopping it isn't hard but finding the correct moment and time can be hard. Use the mices around you to stop the demon when it's angry. go to the basement for mice's pentagram and burn the mices there, but don't forget, doing this ritual when the demon isn't angry will cause it to enrage but if you do it while it's angry it will cause it to calm down

CAN YOU DESTROY THE DEMON?

  • Increasing Difficulty
    The demon will get more angry after every ritual.
  • Replayability
    You can get together with your crew and find new mysteries and have new experiences with randomized items every game.
  • Multiplayer Feature
    You need to work as a team to win the game. Making correct decisions and stopping the demon is in your and your team's hands.
